page.title: 16Trowell Service Area,M1.
page.content: The Trowell service area is situated on the M1 motorway between junctions 25 and 26.It provides the travellers on the motorway with an all-year-round service including a full restaurant and a fast-food service,catering for all needs.Newsagents,confectioners and gift shops are also on site.There are also free parking and toilet facilities provided.Petrol,of course, is the prime commodity of which 2.5m gallons are sold each year and the garage also provides facilities for repairs.The area is open every day of the year for petrol but closed on Christmas Day for everything else.The area makes about Â£10 million p.a but costs about Â£9.75 million to run.It provides jobs for about 150 local people and has been featured in several TV film productions.Its biggest problem is vandalism.
